findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The _upgradeTo function allows an authorized user to upgrade the contract, but it does not restrict who can call this function, potentially leading to unauthorized upgrades.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The _mint function allows minting an unlimited number of tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: burn
findings.description: Potential burn vulnerability in ERC20BurnableUpgradeable contract

findings.title: burnFrom
findings.description: Potential burnFrom vulnerability in ERC20BurnableUpgradeable contract.

findings.title: Transfer
findings.description: executes transfers of a specified number of tokens to a specified address

findings.title: approve
findings.description: Unprotected approve function allows unauthorized access to transfer tokens.

findings.title: increaseAllowance
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Decrease Allowance Vulnerability
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Low token supply
findings.description: The total token supply is low.

findings.title: Low minting functionality
findings.description: The smart contract has a low minting functionality which can lead to unintended consequences.
